description.english: Complete a Single Mission on any difficulty

displayName.english: When we say business, we mean business!

displayName.hungarian: Nálunk az üzlet az komoly dolog!

description.english: Complete a Defend the Base! session with at least 50,000 minerals mined on Hard difficulty or higher
description.schinese: 在困难或更高难度下完成一次“保卫基地！”会话，至少开采5万单位的矿物

description.latam: Completa una sesión de ¡Defiende la Base! con al menos 50,000 minerales extraídos en dificultad Difícil o superior
